Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $23.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:17:44 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Turn the backseat into a closet on wheels

Traveling in the car with dresses and clothes?Yes,This Car Clothes Hanger Bar from Mysbiker makes it easy to keep your clothes tidy and clean. when you’re on the go. Whether you’re traveling for work or just taking a road trip.Your clothes will stay fresh and wrinkled- free as they hanging in your vehicle .This bar can be attached to the overhead handles or garment hooks on your back seat, It’s more stable and it accommodates a far greater load than traditional bars.You may need this during a road trip, family vacations, or before an important meeting.

Easy To Install And Expand Without Much Effort

Two Ways to Install: Fix the end hook in the lower position to hook the handle, or rotate vertically to hang on the ceiling hook.Universal Fit: The bysbiker expandable clothes bar can extend from 35 in to 59 in. This allows more space for hanging and to perfectly fit most vehicles.Perfect for college students, movings,and cross-country road tours.Rubberized grip sleeves and dividers keep clothes from sliding during driving.Easy to Install: The bar has dual mount hangers that can quickly attach to interior grab handles and garment hooks,no tools required.

Heavy-duty Metal Car Clothes Bar

Heavy-duty, metal car clothes bar holds up to 30 lbs.Perfect for college students, moving, vacationers and cross-country road tours, it expands from 35″ to 59″ to fit most cars, and features adjustable grip sleeves and dividers to keep clothes from sliding, even on the tightest turns.

Extendable

Universal Fit with Extendable Bars: Our extendable clothes bar can extend from 35 inches to 59 inches and maximally holds up to 30 lbs of clothing to accommodate sedans, vans, SUVs,Trucks and more.

Non-Slip Rubber Grips

The expandable Car Clothes Bar is covered with anti-slip rubber to keep the clothes from sliding around during driving.

Material
PVC+TPU ABS+Rubber Alloy steel Alloy Steel+Rubber

Color
Black Black Silver/Black Black

Size
8.3 x 6.1 x 3.6″ 6.7 x 2.4 x 3.9″ 10.6 x 4.5 x 1.9″ 36 x 2.6 x 2.5″

Application
Phone below 6.5″ like Iphone12、11,Pro Max X XR Xs 7s 8 Plus 7 6s 6, Samsung Galaxy S20 S10 S9 A71 A51 A10,Note20 10 /9/8/4,Xiaomi, Huawei, oppo LG, Sony, Moto, Google Pixel, Nexus etc. 4″-6.5″devices： Such as Iphone12、11,Pro Max X XR Xs 7s 8 Plus 7 6s 6, Samsung Galaxy S20 S10 S9 A71 A51 A10,Note20 10 /9/8/4,Xiaomi, Huawei, oppo LG, Sony, Moto, Google Pixel, Nexus etc. Motorcycles, bicycles, scooters and any vehicle where there are holes or spokes on a wheel. Sedans,Vans,SUVs,Trucks and Jeep.Such as Ford (Focus ST Explorer)、 Honda CRV、 Toyota （Corolla E350 ）、Chrysler （Mini Van 2019 f250）、 Equinox 、Canyon 、Nissan （Pathfinder）、Rogue、 Murano、 Traverse 、Acadia（2014 GMC ）and etc.

Key Feature
Universal fit,Waterproof,Sensitive Tough Screen,Large Capacity Shockproof,360°Rotation,Wide Compatibility,One-hand Operation,Waterproof Easy to Lock, 110dB Alarm Deterrent, Waterproof, Anti-theft Expand up to 65 inches,Durable and Load-bearing,Easy to Install

►A Moving Wardrobe: The Mysbiker car clothes hanger bar would keep your clothes wrinkle-free during road trips,family vacations,laundry or business trips where your clothes need to be kept or hung neatly without collapsing in your vehicles.This clothes bar is Really helped in packing for a cross country trip,car camping.Just a magic wand will turn your car into a mobile wardrobe.
►Universal Fit: The vehicle clothes hanging rack that fits most every vehicle on the road.Expandable from 33 inch to 63.5 inch easy to adjust the length,max holds up to 50 lbs of clothing to accommodate sedans,vans,SUVs,Trucks and more.
► Rubber Grips and Rings: The clothes rod bar adopts 3 sections of Non-Slip Grips Dividers and rubberized grip sleeves enable you to organize and not worry about things flying all over the place , even on tight turns for a smoother.so you can hang a suit, dress shirts, button ups, pants, etc
►Durable and Load-bearing: The Car Hanger are constructed of rust-resistant, powder coated steel,which is durable and load-bearing. Up to 50 pounds (approximately 22.7 kg), which means you can hang 80-100 T-shirts or 40-50 suits at the same time even when fully extended.
►Easy to Install: There are two ways to connect the hanging bar : fix the end hook in the lower position to hook the handle, or rotate vertically to hang on the ceiling hook. just pivoting end hangers can be turned down to hook over car grab handles, or rotated upright to hang securely from garment hooks.

Turn the backseat into a closet on wheels

  • Traveling in the car with dresses and clothes?Yes,This Car Clothes Hanger Bar from Mysbiker makes it easy to keep your clothes tidy and clean. when you’re on the go. Whether you’re traveling for work or just taking a road trip.Your clothes will stay fresh and wrinkled- free as they hanging in your vehicle .
  • This bar can be attached to the overhead handles or garment hooks on your back seat, It’s more stable and it accommodates a far greater load than traditional bars.

This allows more space for hanging and to perfectly fit most vehicles.Perfect for college students, movings,and cross-country road tours.Rubberized grip sleeves and dividers keep clothes from sliding during driving.
  • Easy to Install: The bar has dual mount hangers that can quickly attach to interior grab handles and garment hooks,no tools required.

Heavy-duty, metal car clothes bar holds up to 30 lbs.Perfect for college students, moving, vacationers and cross-country road tours, it expands from 35″ to 59″ to fit most cars, and features adjustable grip sleeves and dividers to keep clothes from sliding, even on the tightest turns.

item.title: Hurray 3 Pack Puppy Chew Toys for Teething Puppies, Puppy Teething Toys, 360° Clean Pet Teeth & Soothe Pain of Teeth Growing, Puppy Toys Small Dogs & Medium Dog Suitable – Up to 18 lbs
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Product Description For dogs and other pets, toys are not a luxury, but a necessity. Toys aren’t a luxury when it comes to your dog. They’re an absolute necessity. They not only prevent boredom and the negative behaviors that can arise when dogs are bored, they also stimulate their brains ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $12.99 - $9.94
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:32:03 UTC – Details)

Product Description

For dogs and other pets, toys are not a luxury, but a necessity.

Toys aren’t a luxury when it comes to your dog. They’re an absolute necessity. They not only prevent boredom and the negative behaviors that can arise when dogs are bored, they also stimulate their brains and trigger dogs’ natural play drive.

1. Active toys: The interactive dog biting toys can be applied for training your dog’s biting skills, helping them correct the destructive bitting habits, guide a correct chewing habits. Protecting shoes, socks, sheets, sofas not being destroyed! It is also a puzzle toy for dog grow.

2. Comfort toys: When a dog is teething, its gums will be itchy and ache, which is very painful. The pea shaped chew toys through let the dog bites something to relieve the pain of teething.

3. Distraction toys: Toys are important to your dog’s well-being. Toys help fight boredom when you have to leave your dog at home, and provide comfort when they’re feeling nervous. Toys can even help prevent your dog from developing certain problem behavior

Soft without hurting teeth

The Hurray rubber toy is very soft and can even be bent 90 degrees without breaking, fully protecting the dog’s teeth.

Clean teeth in all directions

When a dog is teething, its gums will be itchy and ache, which is very painful. The pea shaped chew toys through let the dog bites something to relieve the pain of teething.

It adopts 360-degree full-enclosed molar protruding points, a total of 578 protruding points.

Nature Rubber & Non-toxic

The Hurray pea shape dog chew toys are made of natural rubber, It’s very durable non-toxic. And the size are suitable for small or medium dog.

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 4.72 x 1.97 x 1.38 inches; 6.7 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ March 17, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ INECO
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08Z851B92

Dog toys for small dogs, adopts 360-degree full-enclosed molar protruding points, a total of 578 protruding points, the height of the protruding points is high, and the pet molars have a good effect. Clean the tartar for dogs in all directions, prevent dental diseases, and maintain oral health. Let the dog have a shining good tooth.
Puppy chew toys Made of rubber , fit for chewing and will not hurt the puppie’s teeth. The puppy has no pain in the gums when used, which makes them love it.
The teething chew toys for puppies can be easily cleaned with water.
You can use the puppy toys to interactive with you dog, increase interest, enhance the dog’s interest, develop the dog’s intelligence, give the dog more care and make them smarter.

For dogs and other pets, toys are not a luxury, but a necessity.

Toys aren’t a luxury when it comes to your dog. They’re an absolute necessity. They not only prevent boredom and the negative behaviors that can arise when dogs are bored, they also stimulate their brains and trigger dogs’ natural play drive.

item.title: IRIS USA 3-Piece or 2-Piece 35 Lbs / 45 Qt WeatherPro Airtight Pet Food Storage Container Combo and Treat Box for Dog Cat Bird Food, Keep Pests Out, Translucent Body
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) IRIS plastic airtight container combo includes one 33 quart sealed storage container, two 12 quart sealed storage container, one matching 2 cup food scoop and one set of wheels for your pet food storage needs. The sealed storage container features a foam seal and snaps lock latches to keep pet ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $36.99 - $31.44
(as of Nov 29,2022 00:59:37 UTC – Details)


IRIS plastic airtight container combo includes one 33 quart sealed storage container, two 12 quart sealed storage container, one matching 2 cup food scoop and one set of wheels for your pet food storage needs. The sealed storage container features a foam seal and snaps lock latches to keep pet food fresh and keep pests or moisture out. Designed as pet food bins, these BPA free airtight storage bins offer many other uses as well, such as leash and toy storage, pellet storage, grain storage, birdseed storage, cat litter storage, or even as a charcoal container. The small food storage bin neatly stacks on top of the large one, and the translucent bodies allow content levels to be checked at a glance. This airtight pet food container combo is versatile, functional, and the wheels allow for easy mobility between any areas in the house. The 33QT Container Holds up to 25LBS of dry pet food and 12QT Container Holds up to 10LBS of dry pet food or treat.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 16.5 x 10.83 x 24.5 inches; 4.58 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 500090
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ February 11, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ IRIS USA, Inc.
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08WH8BY8Y
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ USA

CONTENTS: 10 Lbs / 12 Qt storage container stacks on the 25 Lbs / 33 Qt storage container, one matching 2 cup food scoop, and one set of wheels. Included scoop makes measuring food easy and attachable casters make it easy to roll it from the storage area to your dog or cat bowl.
CLEAR CONTAINER BODY: The translucent body allows you to check the food level in just one glance. Quickly check the remaining amount before you head to the pet store.
DIFFERENT COLORS: Check out the different color containers to store your cute friend’s kibbles, pellets, seeds, and treats.
MADE IN USA: Produced by a Japanese company. Made in the USA. Used all around the world. BPA Free & FDA Compliant. Safe for you and your flurry friend.
DIMENSIONS: 16.50″L x 10.83″W x 18.63″H

Pet food bins have foam airtight seals to keep the freshness of pet food and treat

The set includes one matching 2 cup food scoop

The wheels allow for easy mobility between any areas in the house.

Read more

The top container can hold up to 10 pounds of pet treats or canned food.

The bottom container can hold 25 pounds of dry food. It may be used for dog dry food storage, leash & toy storage, cat dry food storage, pellet food storage, grain storage, birdseed storage, cat litter storage, or even as a charcoal storage container.

Easy to stack. The container combo is versatile & functional

Read more

Choose your favorite color from the color variations

BPA Free & FDA Compliant. Safe for you and your flurry friend.

Produced by a Japanese company. Made in the USA. Used all around the world.
